about_us_intro:
Dear ladies and gentlemen, I am glad to welcome you to my page.

You will not regret choosing Croatia for your holiday!

Welcome to Croatia!!!

I am a Tour Guide in Croatia. I have been living on the Istrian peninsula since 2001.

Graduated from the Economic Institute in Moscow. I have been working in tourism since 2006, and received a guide license in 2009. In 2010 - a license as a sworn translator.

Excursions and tours in Croatia, Slovenia and other regional countries, all this and much more with your Russian-speaking Croatia guide.

Transfer to any point in Croatia and nearby countries, time to your destination will fly by when you are accompanied by a private guide in Croatia.
name: Name and Surname
